lastMessage.message: Text messages have the benefit of instant communication with colleagues, customers, and clients. Sending a long text message is no different than a short message, except most text messaging services have a character limit that rivals a Tweet. When characters limit you, you may have to break up your texts or send a vague, confusing message. Textedly gives you the ability to communicate in a variety of text lengths.
